name: Homegear::registerThread
shortDescription: Makes a new thread known to Homegear
description: This method makes a new thread known to Homegear. It is required so that the system can receive events.

parameters.name: scriptId
parameters.description: This is the script ID and token as returned by "getScriptId()". Note that "getScriptId()" can be called only in the main thread or after registerThread() has been called.

returnValue: It returns true if successful and false if no matching thread could be found.
